members.name: Kevin Delgado
members.bio: Kevin Delgado created the static sites, added and linked the home photos, created the consistant nav bar/footer, and ensured all html was valid. The site will also be hosted on this repository

members.name: Nicholas Harney
members.bio: Nicholas Harney is developing the initial About page of the project. He uses the eleventy collections to include the team members bio information, as well as a link to each member's github page.

members.name: Ethan Ton
members.bio: Ethan assisted with the formatting of the pages and the application of the mvp.css for the design of the website.

members.name: Donald Novasky
members.bio: Donald Novasky assisted with the overall layout of the website and updated the about page. He also implemented the design of the nav buttons in the home page and photos page and fixed vnu warning
